00026 #include "OgreLogManager.h"
00027 
00028 #include "OgreException.h"
00029 
00030 // Required for va_start, va_end and sprintf
00031 #include <stdio.h>
00032 #include <stdarg.h>
00033 
00034 namespace Ogre {
00035 
00036     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00037     template<> LogManager* Singleton<LogManager>::ms_Singleton = 0;
00038     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00039     LogManager::LogManager()
00040     {
00041         mDefaultLog = 0;
00042 
00043     }
00044     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00045     LogManager::~LogManager()
00046     {
00047         // Destroy all logs
00048         LogList::iterator i;
00049         for (i = mLogs.begin(); i != mLogs.end(); ++i)
00050         {
00051             delete i->second;
00052         }
00053 
00054         if( mDefaultLog )
00055             delete mDefaultLog;
00056     }
00057     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00058     Log* LogManager::createLog( const String& name, bool defaultLog, bool debuggerOutput)
00059     {
00060         Log* newLog = new Log(name, debuggerOutput);
00061 
00062         if (mLogs.empty() || defaultLog)
00063         {
00064             mDefaultLog = newLog;
00065         }
00066 
00067         return newLog;
00068 
00069 
00070     }
00071     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00072     Log* LogManager::getDefaultLog()
00073     {
00074         if (!mDefaultLog)
00075             Except(Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, "No logs created yet. ", "LogManager::getDefaultLog");
00076 
00077         return mDefaultLog;
00078     }
00079     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00080     Log* LogManager::getLog( const String& name)
00081     {
00082         LogList::iterator i = mLogs.find(name);
00083         if (i != mLogs.end())
00084             return i->second;
00085         else
00086             Except(Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, "Log not found. ", "LogManager::getLog");
00087 
00088 
00089     }
00090     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00091     void LogManager::logMessage( const String& message, LogMessageLevel lml)
00092     {
00093         getDefaultLog()->logMessage(message, lml);
00094     }
00095     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00096     void LogManager::logMessage( LogMessageLevel lml, const char* szMessage, ... )
00097     {
00098         static char szBuffer[4097];
00099         va_list list;
00100         va_start( list, szMessage );
00101 
00102         vsprintf( szBuffer, szMessage, list );
00103         getDefaultLog()->logMessage( szBuffer, lml );
00104 
00105         va_end( list );
00106     }
00107     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00108     void LogManager::setLogDetail(LoggingLevel ll)
00109     {
00110         getDefaultLog()->setLogDetail(ll);
00111     }
00112     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00113     LogManager& LogManager::getSingleton(void)
00114     {
00115         return Singleton<LogManager>::getSingleton();
00116     }
00117 }
